Text:
Hi thanks for another great upload,just a query, a couple of tracks every now and then, wont play through pcdj they still work on other formats but forsome reason the same tracks from diffarant downloads wont load . any ideas would be greatly appreciated.
lee
ps.keep up the great work

@theagent57 

Its probably a tagging issue within pcdj, if you have loaded the file with one date inserted in the tag, and then load the same file with another date in the tag, then ths will cause a conflict, the only thing i can suggest is to remove it from pcdj and reload the file. i had similar problems when i used pcdj, and one of the reasons i moved to virtualdj. hope this helps :o)
I have had te same prob. download Xilisosoft Audio converter and re - encode files this will solve your problems they will then play in PCDJ

@theagent57
Another thing you could do is to use mp3tag (www.mp3tag.de/en/) to edit the tags yourself. You can then delete all the date/comment/genre tags which cause the problems =)

asianbi 
I don't doubt you are correct but I find it so easy to re-encode in seconds with no input from myself I was only trying to help.
cheers everyonei new i could depend on you all in time of need  sorry it took so long to reply, but its december and looking at my pc at home after bookings fills me with dred thanks again
